__e: She's on her way to Greece, and she's out there all alone.
I think the reason you're going to Greece and you've broken off your engagement - Miss Bartlett told me - is that... you love George.
We can take Mama to Greece in the summertime... and for Xmas too.
Larry, if Greece isn't the promised land, why don't we just go home?
What mother in Greece has not dreamed that her first-born was a god?
Greece is a long haul. Greece!
